attributes.action: Criminalise all religious practices within in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Religion has been a scourge the world over every since the concept was born,however it has become the very root of all wrongdoing and conflict.
 Any positive psychological benefits it may have previously demonstrated are clearly outweighed by the prejudice and violence incumbent with it.
 Ultimately a war may begin for other spurious reasons such as land,money or most recently oil but it will eventually descent into a bloody battle with religious bigotry fuelling the heart of it.
  For the Prime Minister to criminalise religion on brittish soil would be the ultimate public stance against prejudice and hate in the name of religion.
